channel.title: Alerts Feed
channel.description: Alerts Feeds -- Los Angeles Fire Department

item.description: KNOCKDOWN Brush Fire; INC#1762; 10:31PM; NB 5 Fwy x EB 210 Fwy; MAP: https://bit.ly/3rQwS5l; #Sylmar; LAFD (32 FF) and LA County FD made quick work of the brush fire, surrounding the small burn area with hose, and dousing it with water. Crews held the burn to *less than* a tenth of an acre, achieving a knockdown of the flames in 41 minutes from the time of alarm. No reported injuries. Cause under investigation.; FS 91; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; AO1 AO2 BC10 BC12 E18 E275 E290 E298 E7 E75 E87 E90 E91 E98 EM15 H1 H3 H4 HA1 HA3 HA4 T75 T90 T98 WT77; CH8; 17; Nicholas Prange

Brush Fire; INC#1762; 09:50PM; NB 5 Fwy x EB 210 Fwy; MAP: https://bit.ly/3rQwS5l; #Sylmar; Approximately 50' x 75' area of brush on fire, with no wind and no structures threatened. LA County FD responding in mutual aid, and CHP assisting with lane closures on the freeway.; FS 91; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; BC10 BC12 E18 E275 E290 E298 E7 E75 E87 E90 E91 EM15 H1 H3 H4 HA1 HA3 HA4 T75 T90 T98; CH5; 17; Nicholas Prange

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0559; 10:24AM; 800 N La Jolla Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3QfpHgx; #BeverlyGrove; Crews arrived to find a boarded-up one-story single-family home with fire in the rear bedroom and throughout the attic. It took 32 firefighters 25 minutes to access, confine, and extinguish the flames, using coordinated efforts between rooftop ventilation and interior fire attack. One firefighter with non-life-threatening injuries has been transported to a local hospital in fair condition.; FS 41; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 5; BC18 BC5 CM20 CM22 CM52 E227 E229 E261 E27 E41 E61 E97 EM11 RA41 RA861 RA97 SO1 T27 T29 T61; CH9; 12 13; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#0559; 09:59AM; 800 N La Jolla Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3QfpHgx; #BeverlyGrove; One-story single-family home with smoke showing. Offensive mode.; FS 41; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 5; BC18 BC5 CM20 CM22 CM52 E227 E229 E261 E27 E41 E61 E97 EM11 RA41 RA861 RA97 SO1 T27 T29 T61; CH9; 12 13; Nicholas Prange

Knockdown - Structure Fire; INC#0353; 08:28AM; 7449 N Aldea Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3QaKim5; #LakeBalboa; 30 Firefighters took just 16 minutes to extinguish flames that extended from a detached garage - fully involved on LAFD arrival - into a portion of the adjacent one-story home. No injury. Fire cause under investigation.; FS 100; Batt 10; Valley Bureau; Council District 6; BC10 E100 E103 E273 E290 E73 E83 RA100 RA73 T73 T90; CH9; 17; Brian Humphrey

Structure Fire; INC#0353; 08:12AM; 7449 N Aldea Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3QaKim5; #LakeBalboa; PRELIM: Detached one-story residential garage fully involved.; FS 100; Batt 10; Valley Bureau; Council District 6; BC10 E100 E103 E273 E290 E83 RA100 RA73 T73 T90; CH9; 17; Brian Humphrey

title.a: Update Traffic Collision with Entrapment 10/09/2023 INC#1418

item.description: Update Traffic Collision with Entrapment; INC#1418; 06:58PM; 7900 N Sepulveda Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3FgRiY5; #VanNuys; Two vehicle collision, with one vehicle striking a light pole, trapping and critically injuring a female passenger. The female driver of that car (serious condition), and the male driver of the other car (fair condition) , were not trapped. Unknown patient ages, affiliation or circumstances. All three have been taken to regional trauma center by LAFD Paramedics. Media Inquiries: LAPD Valley Traffic Division (Incidents #3563/3565); FS 90; Batt 10; Valley Bureau; Council District 6; BC10 E290 E39 E81 E90 EM15 EM17 HR3 RA100 RA81 RA881 RA90 T90 UR88; CH8; 17; Brian Humphrey

Traffic Collision with Entrapment; INC#1418; 06:31PM; 7900 N Sepulveda Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3FgRiY5; #VanNuys; PRELIM: At least three patients at a multi-vehicle traffic collision with entrapment.; FS 90; Batt 10; Valley Bureau; Council District 6; BC10 E290 E39 E81 E90 EM15 HR3 RA81 RA881 RA90 T90 UR88; CH8; 17; Brian Humphrey

Knockdown - Structure Fire; INC#0968; 02:35PM; 11400 S Figueroa St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3FaGfjb; #VermontVista; First arriving 30 LAFD Firefighters took just 45 minutes to access, confine and fully extinguish stubborn flames in a 2800 square foot one-story 'Jack In The Box' fast food restaurant (built 2002) that was in operation at the time of the fire. No injury. Fire cause under investigation.; FS 64; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 8; BC13 BC4 CM20 CM22 E233 E264 E266 E57 E64 E65 E79 EM11 FR64 RA264 RA864 T33 T64 T66; CH9; 12; Brian Humphrey

Structure Fire; INC#0968; 01:50PM; 11400 S Figueroa St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3FaGfjb; #VermontVista; PRELIM: Offensive firefight in a one-story fast food restaurant.; FS 64; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 8; BC13 E233 E264 E57 E64 E65 FR64 RA264 RA864 T33 T64; CH9; 12; Brian Humphrey
